section.title: Prepare the Operating System
section.para: The OS must be prepared to host the Management Server using the following steps. These steps must be performed on each Management Server node.

listitem.para: Log in to your OS as root.
Check for a fully qualified hostname.
This should return a fully qualified hostname such as "kvm1.lab.example.org". If it does not, edit /etc/hosts so that it does.
Set SELinux to be permissive by default.
